title: Advertise LiveLogger during preview via logger output
body:
Consider adding a message to the console logger output advertising LiveLogger during the preview timeframe

- omit the message if standard output is redirected to a file or a pipe
- relevant to the build server or TERM environment var set as "dumb" cases

@baronfel - feel free to add more details if needed.

nodes.body: Consider omitting the message if standard output is redirected to a file or a pipe (as might happen on a build server), or if the TERM environment variable is set as "dumb".
